content.text:
# List of Second Italo-Ethiopian War weapons of Ethiopia

This is a list of weapons used by Ethiopia during the Second Italo-Ethiopian War. Ethiopian weapons mainly consisted of the various small arms Ethiopia had brought over the years.
Small arms
Rifles
* Fusil Gras mle 1874-Most popular ( some cut-down rifles)
* Chassepot
* ZH-29
* Lebel Model 1886 rifle( some cut-down rifles)
* Berthier rifle (cut-down rifles)
* FN Model 24 and Model 30
* Mauser Model 1871
* Kar98k
* Mauser Standardmodell
* Gewehr 1888
* Gewehr 98
* Werndl–Holub rifle
* Kropatschek rifle
* Mosin–Nagant
* Mannlicher M1888
* Mannlicher M1890 carbine
* Lee Enfield
* Mannlicher M1895
* M1870 Italian Vetterli>(some cut-down rifles)
* Carcano
* Snider–Enfield
* Martini–Henry
* Berdan rifle(some cut-down rifles)
* Remington Rolling Block rifle
Carbines
* Revelli-Beretta M1915
Machine guns
* Madsen machine gun
* M1918 Browning Automatic Rifle
* Breda M1930
* ZB vz. 26
* ZB vz. 30
* FN Model 30
* Hotchkiss Mle 1914 machine gun
* M1917 Browning machine gun
Submachine guns
* Bergmann MP 34/I
* MP35
* OVP 1918 (Bought from Italy before the war)
Traditional weapons
Swords
* Shotel
Spears
* Spear
Bows
Bow and arrow
Armoured fighting vehicles(AFV's)
Tanks
* Fiat 3000-Four Model 1921 models bought from Italy in 1925-1930.
Tankettes
* L3/33-Captured from Italy during the war.
References
